explanation: [0-0] A man in blue clothes is standing in a room, his mouth pursed. Behind him are light brown wooden boards with light blue light strips on them. Above, a white caption reads "OMG it's Opposite Day".

[0-3] The man in blue is holding a mobile phone in his right hand, looking down at it. Then he opens his mouth wide, his eyes wide with surprise. The man in blue turns his head to the right, talking, then looks up and down.
